title: (x) script on Lucky rhine stone T-shirt - copperplate script (various) {Stephen}
content:
hi guys,

my client wishes to use a font similar to the attached for a t-shirt design (simply a text statement). any idea of a font that is close to this?

it only needs to be close, we can obviously play with leading characters.

regards  
mike

| --- | --- |
| [luckyrhinestonetshirt.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010130004/http:/typophile.com/files/luckyrhinestonetshirt.JPG) | 23.39 KB |

 [‹ (x) View Stern logo - Neutraface {Patricia}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010130004/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17873 "Go to previous forum topic") [KY Farm Bureau ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010130004/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17892 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mike_from_nz

comments.content:
This is known as a copperplate script. Here are a few:

[English Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010130004/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=3&displayfontid=EF.101024.0.0&fontRendererText=Lucky+)  
 [Kuenstler Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010130004/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=3&displayfontid=LH.394.0.0&fontRendererText=Lucky+)  
 [Shelley Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010130004/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=3&displayfontid=LH.457.0.0&fontRendererText=Lucky+)  
 [Palace Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010130004/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=5&displayfontid=M.264.0.0&fontRendererText=Lucky+)  
 [Englische Schreibschrift](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010130004/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=SG.1966.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Lucky+&sampleSize=48)  
 [Embassy](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010130004/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=BT.107544.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Lucky+&sampleSize=48)

hey thanks for that stephen!

mike
